data.title: Nobel Prize in Literature - Vocab, Definition, and Must Know Facts
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature is a prestigious international award given annually to an author who has produced outstanding literary work. It recognizes the author's contribution to literature and their impact on the world of writing.
data.text:
Definition

The Nobel Prize in Literature is a prestigious international award given annually to an author who has produced outstanding literary work. It recognizes the author's contribution to literature and their impact on the world of writing.
